originalText.text: The worst place in the city to serve the papers! Prepare to wait 30 min up to gain access. They have only one designated person from the messenger center that can walk you up/escort you to make the delivery. It is a joke!

text.text: The worst place in the city to serve the papers! Prepare to wait 30 min up to gain access. They have only one designated person from the messenger center that can walk you up/escort you to make the delivery. It is a joke!

originalText.text: I use your services to file annual reports for a corporate client.  Your CTAdvantage Website, through all the many years I have used it, has achieved the easiest, clearest, most efficient status.  I am very grateful and impressed!  The persons you provide to help people who use this service are always friendly and expert.  Thank you!

originalText.text: These guys are not reasonable and behave unethically.  I never was disclosed a price to have them be my registered agent.  They then send bills one year after setting up your entity that are 6 times greater than what most other registered agents charge.  When I called them to make some kind of offer in compromise, they refuse to negotiate and then send bills for a second year of service.  Stay away from these pirates.

text.text: These guys are not reasonable and behave unethically.  I never was disclosed a price to have them be my registered agent.  They then send bills one year after setting up your entity that are 6 times greater than what most other registered agents charge.  When I called them to make some kind of offer in compromise, they refuse to negotiate and then send bills for a second year of service.  Stay away from these pirates.

originalText.text: If they had a zero, I would have selected that.  I have asked this company numerous times to stop my registered agent service.  I have called on the phone, sent USPS correspondence, and have filed with the BBB New York today.  If you were any kind of reputable business you would stop sending invoices for a service that you were told was no longer needed or wanted.  But, you probably aren't a very reputable business since your shyster tactics are used to collect money from services of which you are not performing.   Typical New York tactic, always trying to rip the small businessmen off by sending threatening letters.  Have fun with your negative Google Review as I hope you receive more 1 star ratings.  Hope a lot of people have a chance to read about your unethical company.

originalText.text: CT is the repository for legal papaers to be served on various companie in NYC who do not have a center for accepatance of legal papers. Long way to get up to the 42nd floor through security and walking back to the elevators and up.
